name: North Highland
tagline: Change and transformation consultancy with local staffing and strong work-life balance
description: North Highland helps businesses move from strategy to reality, taking a pragmatic and practical approach to build solutions that work and create impact that lasts. As the world's leading change and transformation consultancy, our award-winning services – powered by a combination of talent and technology – turn client visions into real, measurable value.
known_for: Founded in 1992 with a focus on work-life balance and local staffing model to minimize consultant travel. Known for practical, results-oriented transformation consulting across industries. Part of Cordence Worldwide network and backed by OMERS Private Equity since 2023.
career_path: Business Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Senior Consultant (3-4 yrs) → Manager → Partner

recruiting.process: Resume → Phone Screen (recruiter) → HR Interview → Manager/Technical Interview → Offer
recruiting.unique: Does not hire fresh undergraduates. MBAs hired at Senior Consultant level. May include case study or business scenario analysis. Process can take 2-12 weeks.
recruiting.timeline: Rolling applications year-round, 2-12 weeks from application to offer

byu.tip: North Highland doesn't recruit undergrads. MBAs or experienced professionals only. Leverage the 6 current BYU alumni for informational interviews about the Sr. Consultant role and their local office model.
